long_desc: A bottle of Evian natural spring water is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You've been ripped off!  It says here at the bottom of the label, in really
really small letters, 'Bottled in the Midgaard branch of Evian Inc.  This
water is from the natural, mostly clean River of Midgaard.'
It is a large, clean bottle.  There is a large label pasted on the side.
